Package game.used.eventListeners.otherLevels

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AttackEnemy
    checks collisions between hero's attacks and enemies to deal damage and apply effects
    AttacksHitWall
    collisions between attacks and other bodies checks if objects of class Attacks, Heel and BossSpell hit staticBody or Enemy
    BossAttacking
    Class for damage output from attacks by the boss when in contact with Hero
    DeathComesTooSoon
    Destruction listener for Hero in case of death sends player to beginning of the game
    EnemyAttacks
    checks collisions between hero and enemies to deal damage and apply effects to the hero when touched by enemy [not boss]
    EnemyWalk
    the thread of timer correction of walking with this class used to cause deadlock; to make enemies turn around when on the check platforms, or if bat, in contact with things
    FloorIsLava
    Lava tiles deal damage during contact and make you jump
    IsOnPlatform
    Checks if you're on moving platform
    MovingPDown
    makes a moving platform go down in contact with check point
    MovingPHor
    Makes moving platform start moving [walking] the other way upon contact with check point
    MovingPUp
    Sets gravity of moving platform to negative effectively making it fly up with hero
    Munch
    Class checks if fat lady touched dust/lolly and if yes destroys it and adds them to hero's stash
    WallCrunch
    Listener makes it possible to destroy sth when attacked, used on walls to make 'breakable walls' using live count int=4 and plays sound clip upon destruction
